snippet: The last several weeks have amounted to an unlikely journey for Steven D. Sierra of Staten Island, who was suddenly cast 5,000 miles away, searching for his missing wife, Sarai Sierra, in Turkey.
abstract: Steven D Sierra of Staten Island spent six desperate days crisscrossing the city of Istanbul, in search of his missing wife Sarai Sierra; his grim and uncertain odyssey ended when Turkish authorities took him to a morgue to identify her body; she was found dead, her head bludgeoned, and the circumstances of her disappearance and death remain a mystery.
lead_paragraph: The last several weeks have amounted to an unlikely journey for Steven D. Sierra of Staten Island, who was suddenly cast 5,000 miles away, searching for his missing wife, Sarai Sierra, in Turkey.

headline.seo: For Husband of Slain Staten Island Woman, a Grim and Uncertain Odyssey
headline.main: For Husband of Woman Killed in Turkey, a Grim and Uncertain Odyssey
